channel.title: A forum question
channel.description:
ok guys, on this forum if a person is warned it says warned under there name?
same for muted and moderated
well i was wondering how you do this because i want to do it for my forum
ALSO.
sometimes if someone posts a reply and next to it, it has a green dot saying what they did wrong i.e. please do not flame/spam
how do you do this??
thanks, jex

item.title: A forum question
item.dc:creator: @F0rum_Mvp F0rum Mvp
item.description:
@F0rum_Mvp wrote:

i think you cant do that coz i have never seen a forums using that warned system with the dots. you could try your own idea of a warning system. thats why i have a feeling its only available on these forums. I could be wrongâ€¦

Read full topic
